intro:
Push your Oshi to the top!
A must-play for hololive fans!
A fun and easy 3D action game — just keep pushing!
description:
Roll and push the adorable hololive members—your precious “treasures”—all the way to the goal!

How to Play:
Simply roll or toss your “treasures” (hololive talents) to move forward!
Combine matching treasures to evolve them into new ones!
Keep merging and rolling to reach the top!

Multiplayer:
Play online with up to 4 players and cooperate to reach the goal!
You can also compete in local 2-player races to clear the same stage as fast as possible.

Stages:
Includes 36 stages featuring a variety of themes, including Secret Society holoX and hololive DEV_IS!
Race to the summit against players from around the world!

Play with Your Favorite Treasures:
Earn stars in stages to swap out the treasures registered in your “Treasure Collection.”
Complete your collection and climb with your favorite hololive member!

Unlock Playable Characters:
Collect coins to unlock mascot characters and use them as playable avatars.
Gather coins efficiently and exchange them for your favorites!

Special Bonus — “Kumarine”:
Play this game on a console that has hololive Treasure Mountain MegaPack (Nintendo Switch™) save data to unlock the exclusive character “Kumarine”!
